examples.example: 我始终相信只要努力就一定会取得成功。

translate.english: I always believe that as long as one works hard, one will definitely succeed.

examples.example: 我一直相信明天会更好。

translate.english: I always believe that tomorrow will be better.

examples.example: 我始终相信未来充满无限可能。

translate.english: I always believe that the future is full of infinite possibilities.
